title: Ravine, Grafton near Troy, New York
inscriptions: verso u.r. in pencil: TT1/ 757/ #402; verso c. in pencil: Ravine, Grafton near Troy/ New York/ 1859./ "Snow Hole"/ where ice and snow are found/ all the year round; verso l.c. in pencil: scene of picnic in August 1859. when/ T. Nast, J.E. Haney. Thos. Butler Gunn/ John, Sallie,Mattie, Eliza Edwards/ participated
